verses.verse: <S%G3606>Why,<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G2657>consider<s%> the <S%G652>Apostle<s%> and <S%G749>High<s%> <S%G749>Priest<s%> of our <S%G3671>profession,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%>
Who was <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to him that <S%G4160>appointed<s%> him, as <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was faithful in <S%G3650>all<s%> his <S%G3624>house.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> man was <S%G515>counted<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> of <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G2596>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745><s%> as he who has <S%G2680>built<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> than the <S%G3624>house.<s%>
For <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G2680>built<s%> by <S%G5100>some<s%> man; but he that <S%G2680>built<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things is <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> was <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> his <S%G3624>house,<s%> as a <S%G2324>servant,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> things which were to be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> after;

But <S%G5547>Christ<s%> as a <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G3624>house;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> are we, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>fast<s%> the <S%G3954>confidence<s%> and the <S%G2745>rejoicing<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G949>firm<s%> to the <S%G5056>end.<s%>
<S%G4645>Harden<s%> not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> as in the <S%G3894>provocation,<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3986>temptation<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness:<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> I was <S%G4360>grieved<s%> with that <S%G1074>generation,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> They do <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G4105>err<s%> in their <S%G2588>heart;<s%> and they have not <S%G1097>known<s%> my <S%G3598>ways.<s%>
<S%G5613>So<s%> I <S%G3660>swore<s%> in my <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> They shall not <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> my <S%G2663>rest.<s%>)

Take <S%G991>heed,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> there be in <S%G5100>any<s%> of you an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G570>unbelief,<s%> in <S%G868>departing<s%> from the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another<s%> <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G891>while<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588>it<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4594>Today;<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> be <S%G4645>hardened<s%> through the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>

For we are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G2722>hold<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of our <S%G5287>confidence<s%> <S%G949>steadfast<s%> to the <S%G5056>end;<s%>

<S%G1722>While<s%> <S%G3588><s%> it is <S%G3004>said,<s%> To <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you will <S%G191>hear<s%> his <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G4645>harden<s%> not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> as in the <S%G3894>provocation.<s%>
For <S%G5100>some,<s%> when they had <S%G191>heard,<s%> did <S%G3893>provoke:<s%> <S%G235>however,<s%> not <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G1831>came<s%> out of <S%G125>Egypt<s%> by <S%G3475>Moses.<s%>

But with <S%G5101>whom<s%> was he <S%G4360>grieved<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years?<s%> was it not with them that had <S%G264>sinned,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2966>carcasses<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness?<s%>
And to <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3660>swore<s%> he that they should not <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2663>rest,<s%> but to them that <S%G544>believed<s%> not?
<S%G2532>So<s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> that they <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G1525>enter<s%> in <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G570>unbelief.<s%>
